channel.title: Linux4Chemistry (Posts about Enzyme Reactions And Properties)

item.title: Molaris
item.dc:creator: l4c
item.description: Includes POLARIS and ENZYMIX in a unique package with an interface. Enzymix is a macromolecular simulation program designed to study the functions of proteins. Polaris is a fast converging computational software based on the Protein Dipoles - Langevin Dipoles (PDLD) approach.
